SELECT sv.srv_no ,srv_name ,srv_category ,srv_end_date , srv_reg_date
,sq.srv_qst_no ,qst_no ,srv_qst
,qst_ch_no ,ch_no ,ch_str
,sr.srv_res_no ,sr.mem_no ,sr.svr_res_ans ,sr.svr_res_date FROM survey sv left outer join survey_question sq on(sv.srv_no = sq.srv_no) left outer join survey_question_choice qc on (sq.srv_qst_no = qc.srv_qst_no) left outer join survey_result sr on (sv.srv_no = sr.srv_no and sq.srv_qst_no = sr.srv_qst_no) WHERE 1=1 and sr.srv_no = #{srvNo } ORDER BY qst_no ASC
SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT sr.mem_no) srv_reg_count FROM survey_result sr WHERE 1=1 and sr.srv_no = #{srvNo }
mapper.insert:
insert into survey_result( srv_res_no , srv_no , srv_qst_no , mem_no , svr_res_ans , svr_res_date ) values( SURVEY_RESULT_SEQ.nextval, #{srvNo}, #{srvQstNo}, #{memNo}, #{svrResAns}, sysdate
)
mapper.select:
SELECT sr.SRV_NO ,MEM_NO ,SRV_NAME ,SRV_CATEGORY ,SRV_END_DATE ,srv_reg_date
,sq.SRV_QST_NO ,QST_NO ,SRV_QST ,SRV_QST_TYPE
,QST_CH_NO ,CH_NO ,CH_STR FROM survey sr left outer join SURVEY_QUESTION sq on(sr.srv_no = sq.srv_no) left outer join SURVEY_QUESTION_CHOICE qc on (sq.srv_qst_no = qc.srv_qst_no) where sr.srv_no = #{srvNo } order by QST_NO ASC, CH_NO ASC

select b.* from ( select a.*, row_number() over (order by a.srv_no desc) rnum from ( select sv.srv_no , sv.mem_no , srv_name , srv_category , srv_end_date , srv_reg_date ,
count(sr.mem_no) as srv_reg_count from survey sv left outer JOIN survey_result sr ON sv.srv_no = sr.srv_no and sr.mem_no = #{memNo} where 1=1
GROUP BY sv.srv_no, sv.mem_no, srv_name, srv_category, srv_end_date, srv_reg_date order by srv_no desc ) a ) b
where b.rnum >= #{startRow} and b.rnum <= #{endRow}

select b.* from ( select a.*, row_number() over (order by a.srv_no desc) rnum from ( select sv.srv_no , srv_name , srv_category , srv_end_date , srv_reg_date
, count(DISTINCT sr.mem_no) as srv_reg_count from survey sv left outer JOIN survey_result sr ON sv.srv_no = sr.srv_no where 1=1
GROUP BY sv.srv_no, -- 기준으로 그룹화할 열 srv_name, srv_category, srv_end_date, srv_reg_date ORDER BY sv.srv_no DESC ) a ) b
where b.rnum >= #{startRow} and b.rnum <= #{endRow}
